description:
More of your favourite characters are coming to Peppa’s world – and they have exciting adventures to share with you! So open the door to more ways to play in My Friend Peppa Pig: Pirate Adventures.

Let’s set sail on Captain Hog's boat! Explore new locations such as Molly Mole's underground burrow, or visit Belinda Bear’s house!

There's a whole world of new stories to experience, from dancing at Danny Dog's birthday party to play pretend on Treasure Island, and over 30 more new interactions. 

Your adventure awaits – what will you and Peppa Pig do next?

BECOME A PIRATE – Danny Dog’s party is the start of a treasure hunt across the sea!

PLAY IN NEW WAYS – Buzz like a bee, find a fossil, play with seashells, and try over 30 more interactions 

FIVE NEW LOCATIONS – Including Captain Hog’s Hideout, Belinda Bear’s House, Treasure Island and more
name: My Friend Peppa Pig: Pirate Adventures
